data.title: Home
data.meta_description: The City of Lynchburg Department of Parks and Recreation offers a variety of services and activities to residents and visitors.
data.text:
About Lynchburg Parks & Recreation

Imagine a city where everyone can enjoy the many benefits of parks, trails, and recreation programs, free from financial, physical, transportation, and awareness barriers. Picture a community that strives to enhance well-being, embraces and protects the natural environment, and uplifts each other with positivity.

Ready to dive in? Explore our website and discover how you can Find Your Fun with us!
